item.description:
Take a break with us at a private home in Beverly. Address supplied before the meetup to those registered.

Our hostess will provide iced tea, lemonade, soda, lemon water and paper products. Bring an appetizer, snack/salad, or dessert. Alcoholic drinks are fine to bring.

Don't forget your bathing suit if it's another one of these hot days - in ground pool available. Back yard is private so people should feel comfortable going for a swim. And wet feet welcomed into the house.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Sunday Mid-Day Break with pot-luck treats 2-5pm
